summary: This bill, the Ending Chemical Abortions Act of 2025, aims to prohibit the use of chemical abortion drugs. It amends Title 18 of the United States Code to criminalize the prescription, dispensing, distribution, or sale of drugs intended to induce abortion, with exceptions for contraception, miscarriage treatment, and life-threatening medical conditions. It also defines abortion, pregnancy, and unborn child, exempting women from criminal prosecution under this section.
